Plot: Emma Thompson stars as a governess who uses magic to rein in the behavior of seven ne'er-do-well children in her charge.
Title: Nanny McPhee
Writer: Emma Thompson (screenplay), Christianna Brand ("Nurse Matilda" books)
Actors: Emma Thompson, Colin Firth, Kelly Macdonald, Thomas Brodie-Sangster
tomatoConsensus: A bit alarming at first, Nanny McPhee has a hard edge to counter Mary Poppins-style sweetness, but it still charms us and teaches some valuable lessons.
